page.title: 18A HEADTEACHER'S DAY PART 3
page.content: 1:15PM TO 4:45PM. 1:15 Afternoon school starts. I have an uninterrupted hour with the class. 2:15 Afternoon break,injured child, ring parent,complete accident form. 2:30 Break over. PE on meadow where I am safe from all bar emergencies. 3:30 School ends;take children to school bus.Mark work,tidy classroom, chat to staff and cleaners. 4:00 Ring Area Office with query.Ring bus company re early bus (see part 1) Prepare typing etc.for next day. 4:30 Check outside of building for damage and lost proprty. 4:45 Leave after having final chat with cleaners.
